sentences.en: "State-owned industries will always perform poorly," John Moore informed readers.
sentences.cn: “国有企业经营不善将是常态，”约翰·穆尔告诉读者。

sentences.en: All great songs are informed by a certain sadness and tension.
sentences.cn: 所有很棒的歌曲都透着某种悲伤和张力。

sentences.en: All those who are immediately involved will be informed of the decision.
sentences.cn: 把这个决定通知所有直接有关的人.

sentences.en: An informed guess at his personal wealth was $1.25 billion.
sentences.cn: 据合理猜测，他的个人财产有12.5亿美元。

sentences.en: He hastened to assure us that the press would not be informed.
sentences.cn: 他急忙向我们保证新闻界是不会知道的.

sentences.en: He informed us with massive understatement that he was feeling disappointed.
sentences.cn: 他极力轻描淡写地跟我们说他感到失望。

sentences.en: He is very well - informed; that's why he won the general knowledge competition.
sentences.cn: 他见识非常广博, 所以他在常识竞赛中获胜.

sentences.en: He looked blank when he was informed of his dismissal.
sentences.cn: 当被告知自己被解雇时,他显得茫然.

sentences.en: I am ill-informed on current affairs.
Informed sources said it was likely that the president would make a televised statement.
sentences.cn: 据消息灵通人士说，总统可能会发表电视声明。

sentences.en: Journalists informed police who planted an undercover detective to trap Smith.
sentences.cn: 记者通知了警方，后者于是为诱捕史密斯而安插了一名卧底侦探。

sentences.en: Please keep us informed of the status of this project.
sentences.cn: 请随时告知我们该项目的进展情况。

sentences.en: Somebody must have informed on us.
Sonia, we are reliably informed, loves her family very much.
sentences.cn: 我们从可靠的消息来源获知索尼娅非常爱自己的家人。

sentences.en: There needs to be a properly informed public debate.
sentences.cn: 有必要让公众在充分知情的状况下展开辩论。

sentences.en: We try and keep ourselves informed about current trends.
sentences.cn: 我们设法随时了解形势的发展.
